column1: The majority of Pennsylvanians voted for @realDonaldTrump. They deserve to have their voices heard and we demand an open and transparent process. Gov. Wolf needs to stop politics and start a fair process.

Significant legal victory for @realDonaldTrump in Philly. GOP poll watchers are now permitted to review ballot counting. PA Gov's office more interested in the speed and quantity rather than the quality of ballots. Dems want to reverse decision. What are they hiding?

When I am in Washington I often take my morning run to the Lincoln Memorial. There I read sometimes out loud if alone Lincoln’s Gettysburg Address. I love it. Particular the last part which is so relevant today...
